p:
Ancestral genetic reconstruction studies carried out by Li et al.
19 on 12 human genome sequences of the new virus seem to indicate that this virus was already circulating in Wuhan on 9 November 2019, with a 95% credible interval, however, which places it between 25 September and 19 December 2019. Thus, the market and the possible presence of super-spreaders resulted in the rapid diffusion and spread of the virus among those attending it.
